page.title: 07GT SAMPFORD BAPTIST CHURCH
page.content: The Baptist Church in Gt.Sampford was built in 1802 by a man called Mr.Pettit.He founded the chapel and preached there until 1825 when he died.In 1805 the first service in the chapel was held.The congregation consisted of seven members.Now in 1985 we are celebrating our 183rd anniversary of this church.Our main preacher is Sister Kay from Ashdon.Next to the chapel is the Sunday School.Our Sunday School teachers are Miss Marsh and Hilda Milton.The organist is Mrs.Mynott.The service begins at 11am and finishes at 12 noon.The Sunday School begins at 11.30pm and finishes at 12 noon.
